version_description:
- Edit e-mail is working again!
- Letters list now contains a brief contents of the letter
- Showing letter info on the top letter (when open letter)
- Download speed became faster letters
- Update the list of messages you can now swipe down
- Letters display more content
- By interface Corrections
- Fixed bugs and improved stability
